extendedInfo.description: Simple one-button setup over Wifi. No extra PC/Mac software required. Completely free.Remote For iTunes Pro isnât some stripped down, do-nothing app. In fact, you can surf through your music downloads like you channel surf from the couch. Quick, easy and simply simple.â¢	Use Androidâs Wi-Fi to control iTunes on your PC or Mac â remotely â from anywhere in the house.â¢	Scan your downloads any way you want â by artist, by album, by playlist or song title, and take control of your music. Remote For iTunes Pro makes choosing tunes easy.â¢	Remote For iTunes Pro puts you in complete control. Play, pause, stop, fast forward or rewind any tune with a clickâ just like your TV remote. Only better.â¢	Switch to DJ mode and be surprised as downloads play in random order. Let your Android be the DJ. You just sit back and enjoy.â¢	Create play lists to suit your mood or that special occasion and launch that playlist with a single click of your Android. No other iTunes app delivers the control of Remote For iTunes Pro from JaredCo.â¢	Remote For iTunes Pro is easy to sync on your âDroid. Download and youâre locked in to your iTunes collection Remote For iTunes Pro knows what to do.â¢	Remote For iTunes Pro runs light on juice so you donât drain your smart phone battery as you pump up the volume. Play it loud, soft or somewhere in between with Remote For iTunes Pro.â¢	And best of all? Remote For iTunes Pro is FREE, as in: it costs you zip.Your music collection represents you and your tastes, from rock to Bach, but no matter what your taste in music, Remote For iTunes Pro puts you in control of tune time.And like every app developed by JaredCo, we design them, we build them and we support them so you know Remote For iTunes Pro works the way a remote should work, adding more function to your Android and easier access to your iTunes collection.Remote For iTunes Pro is easy, simple to use, convenient, deep in functions and itâs totally free so you have absolutely nothing to lose. And, even though Remote For iTunes Pro is free, JaredCo provides free tech support if you need us.Weâre JaredCo and we make apps with purpose, apps that increase the usefulness of your smart phone.Download today and take control of your tunes.Remote For iTunes Pro from JaredCo. You know you gotta have it.

reviews.title: Great App!!!!!!
reviews.comment: This is a great app and works flawlessly. Only better thing that could be added is a widget. Highly recommended to anyone who listens to itunes especially from a distance.
reviews.author: Tyler Ferqueron

reviews.title: Used to work...
reviews.comment: This app was great, but now it doesn\'t work anymore on my AT&T SGS2 Skyrocket after ICS update.  It cannot connect with iTunes on Mac. After entering code into iTunes, the app and iTunes just clock indefinitely.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great for me
reviews.comment: This app does exactly what it says and the design is pretty good. 3 ideas, 1 make a tablet version, 2 make a .99 ad free version, 3 make it work in landscape mode.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its ok but has potential to be amazing
reviews.comment: When Im looking at the list of songs in a album they appear in a random order. I pick a song and a different one in that album plays due to the weird random order it shows.
reviews.author: Nathaniel Gordon

reviews.title: The best remote yet
reviews.comment: Aside from the app running a little slow, this is the best iTunes remote foe android that I have tested and it\'s the only one I stuck with. It works brilliantly. The user interface could be cleaned up a bit but all things considered, I\'m a happy customer.
reviews.author: Benaiah Agoye

reviews.title: PHENOMENAL
reviews.comment: This app greatly exceeded all of my expectations its also really easy to install just type in a 4 digit code
reviews.author: Chance Gudnason

reviews.title: when i search
reviews.comment: it finds the song but go crazy over the whole music library and never plays the song :(
reviews.author: Elinor Naim

reviews.title: Thank do much
reviews.comment: Been waiting for this app to have a free one for Android. I love my itunes remote on iphone. This app id love even more if the album cover fit correct on.screen for galaxy S2.
reviews.author: Sean Michael

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Sometimes issues with initial connection to iTunes, but I think this is an iTunes bug; quiting/restarting iTunes and the passcode sync works.  (This impacts many iTunes remote programs).  Otherwise it works very nicely indeed and has the features you need.  Doesn\'t work in landscape mode (forced portrait orientation).  Would be nice to have a landscape option where the right hand side has the menu buttons already present (especially \"2 speakers\")
reviews.author: Stephen Harris

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Does exactly what you need it to. :-)
reviews.author: Stephanie Pottinger

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Best remote app for itunes so far I love it now i dont have to ho back and forward to change my music, I do it straigth from my phone thanks guys for this, now please if you going to do an update dont kill it please thanks
reviews.author: Christian Coronel

reviews.title: Costly
reviews.comment: What\'s wrong with bluetooth? Why only wifi :/
reviews.author: Shawn Zhang

reviews.title: Look a little closer...
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this app, so I may run into problems later on. However so far it works well. I\'m running a macbook pro \'11 model with aquad core I7. I\'ve read reviews on other apps and most often they\'re scored low because people don\'t know how to use them. When remoting itunes you must click on the remote icon that displays itself in itunes in the upper right hand corner and enter the 4 digit code. I\'ve seen reviews where users have overlooked this fact. I remote with my itouch as well. Awesome app.
reviews.author: Michael Houston

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is amazing! Only thing that doesn\'t work is setting an image as a background. Easy to set up and a joy to use.
reviews.author: Ross Fitzgerald

reviews.title: Above the greedy crap apps
reviews.comment: Works fine. I wish hitting back (on my s3) would take me to the playlist not exit the app. I have to hit menu button then select playlist. Just about extra step that\'s a little annoying. Better than the other neutered free apps. I had a better one on my LG Optimus called iTunes remote+ but can\'t find it anymore. It was on 2.3 os. I recommend this one now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Program
reviews.comment: Does what suppose to do.  I am utilizing this program through an Asus Memo Pad Smart
reviews.author: Ying Kit Lee

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Complete crap wont pair with my notebook, keeps asking for security code over and over. Would give it 5 negative stars for complete fail..
reviews.author: Frank Haber

reviews.title: Maybe works for others
reviews.comment: Will not let me choose the correct track. Always starts playing something else instead of what I\'ve selected. Can\'t find any information on their website about application problems and solutions.
reviews.author: Michael Tansley

reviews.title: Not good.
reviews.comment: It always cues all my music alphabetically... And it just seems broken overall.
reviews.author: Ultra Woodman

reviews.title: Sucks. Blotchy garbage
reviews.comment: Yup get another one. Uninstalling now
reviews.author: Michael Vanderzand
